survey_name: Employee Feedback on Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and engagement with the company's Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives. The insights will help improve future CSR programs and ensure they align with employee values and expectations.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the company's current CSR initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels. Ensure options are clear and mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the company's current CSR initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following CSR initiatives have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice options to capture participation across different initiatives. Include an option for non-participation.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the company's CSR initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and includes a neutral option.
